extendedInfo.description: FreeCaddie is the #1 golf GPS rangefinder on Android with over one million downloads!Now supporting the Pebble smart watch!Get the distance to the front, center and back of each green. Over 28,000 mapped courses!Upgrade to FreeCaddie Pro and get distances to bunkers, hazards, rotated maps, auto-hole advance, shot measuring, statistics and more!

reviews.title: Simple to use, easy to read
reviews.comment: This app is perfect for my needs.  I used my laser to verify distances, the result was impressive.  Plus or minus 1 yard when shooting the front edge of a green.  I have a RAZR M.  It does not kill my battery.  Great job. 5 star app.
reviews.author: Dave Ebels

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Good on battery life. I can make it through 18 on half a battery charge. I like it so well I am going to up grade to paid version.
reviews.author: GreggnSally Ellsworth

reviews.title: Good but not great
reviews.comment: It does what it says but is limited. The yardages are accurate for flat areas, but it doesn\'t take into account elevation changes. And not all courses can be found. If all u want is yardage this a good app, nut if u need to track scores, club choices, etc. keep searching.
reviews.author: Brian Norris

reviews.comment: Good product. I checked with R&A St Andrews and it is comp. legal if I uninstall the compass app. Nice big letters for distances which I can see on screen in bright sunlight.\tGood product. I checked with R&A St Andrews and it is comp. legal if I uninstall the compass app. Nice big letters for distances which I can see on screen in bright sunlight.
reviews.author: Mark Clark

reviews.title: A great app.  Recommend.
reviews.comment: A fantastically simple app.  accurate and quick to update.  No all graphics.  Highly recommend.
reviews.author: Kev Dev

reviews.title: Useful, simple
reviews.comment: This is a useful and simple application. I dumped fancier ones because 1. the fancy images were unreadable in sunlight, and 2. they demanded a constant data connection, which I don\'t have. With FreeCaddie there\'s not a bunch of fancy graphics, just big white numbers on a black background. I can read that anywhere, and quickly. I\'m not puzzling over my phone display while I\'m supposed to be hitting my shot. I can download course definitions when I have a wifi connection and they are stored permanently.  Courses are crowd sourced, but not in a wikipedia sort of way. First to enter is the owner. If something is incorrect you can contact the developer and they can add you to the edit list.  I liked it so much I ponied up for the full version.
reviews.author: Perry Ramsey

reviews.title: Great Program
reviews.comment: Has all the courses I play even the less known.  Have not encountered any glitches, very simple to use and accurate.  Costs hundreds less than a laser unit..... oh wait it\'s free!  THANKS!
reviews.author: Mike Henry

reviews.title: Dreadful since update
reviews.comment: This has been my go to GPS app for the last year or so and it was fantastic.  Latest update has made it totally unuseable.  Yardages about 500 yards out and question marks appearing all the time.  Avoid at the moment.  I hope this will be fixed as I miss the app as it was.
reviews.author: Niall Aitken

reviews.title: Excellent Golf GPS
reviews.comment: I can\'t believe an app this good is free! My days of hunting down sprinkler heads are over... Get this app and you will be delighted by it\'s simplicity and accuracy.
reviews.author: Mark Carillon

reviews.title: PLEASE HELP
reviews.comment: I\'M AT AN OUTING TODAY AND, OF ALL DAYS, IT\'S FORCE CLOSING. GS4
reviews.author: Troy Longo

reviews.comment: I have been goofing for 3 years and have finally been able to break 90 for the first time thanks to this app. It gave me a confidence boost. Awesome app!
reviews.author: Alex Cunha

reviews.title: rubbish
reviews.comment: gave  up trying to understand this app why do these people try to make these apps so difficult  dont they understand the kiss method
reviews.author: JAMES MCGURK

reviews.title: Very easy to use and quite accurate!
reviews.comment: Tried them all and like this one the best.  Fast.
reviews.author: Dave Bodah

reviews.title: Saving my job.
reviews.comment: I am a real caddy and with this app it made my job a lot easier.
reviews.author: thomas simon

reviews.title: Battery Killer
reviews.comment: Kills phone battery, b/c app does NOT stop GPS tracking unless completely logged out .. which then requires wait time to login again. This all takes toooo long on a golf course!!!! :-(
reviews.author: David Szagola

reviews.title: Where\'s my course
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t have my course :(
reviews.author: Peter Golden

reviews.title: I rate it all five stars
reviews.comment: Cool golf
reviews.author: Darrell Bridges

reviews.title: up date not good
reviews.comment: just re installed this app to find it now does not have an edit section to add hazards or adjust measurements during play - this has devalued the app considerably
reviews.author: Pete Mcdowell

reviews.comment: Easy to use accurate shows distance to front back in middle of green in big easy to read numbers
reviews.author: pat mcguinness

reviews.comment: Works like a charm!
reviews.author: Jerry Costanzo
